item.description:
About this Meetup Group

Hi All members of The Boston Drum Circle Meetup:

This has been a GREAT Summer at The Charles River drumming, dancing, meeting new folks and great, warm and exciting energy circulating around the circles. The Banks of The River Charles is a perfect locating when the weather is nice. It sounds a bit like drums sound in Guinea! - If you've never joined us for one of these outdoor DrumCircles, this is your chance to experience something magical! Playing along the river, having dancers, BBQ's - its a party in the making! And we move to Sat. Afternoons to make the party last!

Our next DrumCircle Meetup is Sat. Sept. 25th from 2-4ish at the Charles River (Parking lot #4 near the Public Theatre - depending on parking availability)

Hope to see you all there! Please bring a chair, water and your drum. Email me with any questions you may have. alan@drumconnection.com

Yours in Drumming Spirit,

Alan, Fanta, and Stu
DrumConnection Home
item.how_to_find_us: We start setting up about 30 minutes before the circle. You'll see us. Lost? Call 617.686.6080
item.name: The Boston Drum Circle - Charles River - Weather Permitting
